resources.string: The minimum must be greater than the maximum.
The range is too limited to get this many non-duplicate numbers.
The quantity must be greater than 0.
Please enter in a minimum, maximum, and quantity.
You don\'t have any RNG configurations.
NOTE: Changing the minimum/maximum resets this list.
Please enter in a number to exclude.
You are already excluding this number.
Please enter in a number in the proper range.

As a heads up, here are some app features that may not be immediately apparent. 

1. Click on the buttons in the homepage's toolbar to save/load RNG configurations. 

2. Rename and delete RNG configurations from the settings menu. 

3. Click on the generated numbers box for additional options. 

You can view these instructions again at any given time from the settings menu. Thank you very much for downloading this app, and I hope it serves you well!
Load it automatically upon app start?
This RNG configuration will now automatically load when the app starts.
